p: Ribavirin is abroad spectrum antiviral agent acting by induction of mutations in the viral genome, especially in RNA viruses [ 24]. Ribavirin is officially approved for treating respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) infection and, in combination with interferon Î±2b for hepatitis C virus [ 25]. In addition, it was used for treating SARS CoV infections [ 25]. Given the high similarity of SARS and COVID-19 Mpros, ribavirin might be of a value in treating COVID-19.
